survey.name: spot_prefix
survey.label: Prefix
survey.hint: Label prefix based on location or other.

survey.name: starting_number_for_spot
survey.label: Starting Number
survey.hint: Number to append to the end of every spot name. Increments automatically.

survey.name: warn_on_dupe_spot_name
survey.label: Warn on Duplicate Spot Name
survey.hint: Give a warning if a spot name is duplicated.

survey.name: nested_spot_prefix
survey.label: Alternate Prefix
survey.hint: Use an alternate label prefix for Spots on an Image Basemap or Strat Section.

survey.name: prepend_spot_name_nested_spot
survey.label: Prepend Parent Spot Name
survey.hint: Add the parent spot name to beginning of every nested spot name.

survey.name: restart_num_each_nested_spot
survey.label: Restart Numbering at 1 for Each Image Basemap/Strat Section

survey.name: sample_prefix
survey.label: Prefix
survey.hint: Short label based on location or IGSN prefix (exactly 3 characters) or something else associated with the user.

survey.name: starting_sample_number
survey.label: Starting Number
survey.hint: Number to append to the end of every sample name. Use exactly 6 numbers if creating an IGSN code. Increments automatically.

survey.name: prepend_spot_name_sample_name
survey.label: Prepend Spot Name
survey.hint: Add the spot name to beginning of every sample name.

survey.name: warn_on_dupe_sample_name
survey.label: Warn on Duplicate Sample Name
survey.hint: Give a warning if a sample name is duplicated.

survey.name: restart_sample_num_each_spot
survey.label: Restart Numbering at 1 for Each Spot

survey.name: sample_postfix_letter
survey.label: Append Letter Instead of Number to End of Name, Restarting at 'a' for Each Spot
survey.hint: Add a lowercase letter to the end of each sample name. Increments for each sample within a single spot.
